summary_comment: Nina Berman is a knowledgeable and passionate professor who receives high praise for her engaging lectures and helpfulness. However, students note that she can be a tough grader and is not open to alternative ideas, which can affect grading fairness. Despite this, many find her class interesting and valuable, with take-home tests and a supportive learning environment.

summary_comment: This professor is widely regarded as one of the best due to her engaging lectures, easy-to-understand material, and willingness to help students. However, opinions vary significantly; some find her classes too easy and unstructured, while others warn to avoid her due to her unorganized teaching style and difficulty in grasping the material.

Ratings.comment: Incredible! The material and tests are easy, just pay attention in class. She has great stories about her own experience with the material she teaches. One of the best teachers I've had in a long time!

Keeps it interesting, always happy to help. She expects you not to do the reading, and goes over everything in class in case you havent. No homework other than reading, and tests are all Essay (i like that, some people dont) but she lets you pick topics in advance so you are well prepared. Extremely Lenient and helpful. Also very easy class to BS.
